verses.verse: Remember <S%H2142><s%> also thy <S%H1254>Creator<s%> in the <S%H3117>days<s%> of thy <S%H979>youth<s%>, before the <S%H7451>evil<s%> <S%H3117>days<s%> <S%H935>come<s%>, and the <S%H8141>years<s%> draw <S%H5060>nigh<s%>, when thou shalt <S%H559>say<s%>, I have no pleasure in <S%H2656>them<s%>;

before the <S%H8121>sun<s%>, and the <S%H216>light<s%>, and the <S%H3394>moon<s%>, and the <S%H3556>stars<s%>, are <S%H2821>darkened<s%>, and the <S%H5645>clouds<s%> <S%H7725>return<s%> <S%H310>after<s%> the <S%H1653>rain<s%>;

in the <S%H3117>day<s%> when the <S%H8104>keepers<s%> of the <S%H1004>house<s%> shall <S%H2111>tremble<s%>, and the <S%H2428>strong<s%> <S%H582>men<s%> shall <S%H5791>bow<s%> <S%H2912>themselves<s%>, and the grinders <S%H988>cease<s%> because they are <S%H4591>few<s%>, and those that look <S%H7200>out<s%> of the <S%H699>windows<s%> shall be <S%H2821>darkened<s%>,

and the <S%H1817>doors<s%> shall be <S%H5462>shut<s%> in the <S%H7784>street<s%>; when the <S%H6963>sound<s%> of the <S%H2913>grinding<s%> is <S%H8217>low<s%>, and one shall rise <S%H6965>up<s%> at the <S%H6963>voice<s%> of a <S%H6833>bird<s%>, and all the <S%H1323>daughters<s%> of <S%H7892>music<s%> shall be brought <S%H7817>low<s%>;

yea <S%H3372><s%>, they shall be afraid of that which is <S%H1364>high<s%>, and <S%H2849>terrors<s%> shall be in the <S%H1870>way<s%>; and the <S%H8247>almond-tree<s%> shall <S%H5006>blossom<s%>, and the <S%H2284>grasshopper<s%> shall be a <S%H5445>burden<s%>, and <S%H35>desire<s%> shall <S%H6565>fail<s%>; because <S%H120>man<s%> <S%H1980>goeth<s%> to his <S%H5769>everlasting<s%> <S%H1004>home<s%>, and the <S%H5594>mourners<s%> go <S%H5437>about<s%> the <S%H7784>streets<s%>:

before <S%H3808><s%> the <S%H3701>silver<s%> <S%H2256>cord<s%> is <S%H7576>loosed<s%>, or the <S%H2091>golden<s%> <S%H1543>bowl<s%> is <S%H7533>broken<s%>, or the <S%H3537>pitcher<s%> is <S%H7533>broken<s%> at the <S%H4002>fountain<s%>, or the <S%H1534>wheel<s%> <S%H7665>broken<s%> at the <S%H953>cistern<s%>,
and the <S%H6083>dust<s%> <S%H7725>returneth<s%> to the <S%H776>earth<s%> as it <S%H7307>was<s%>, and the spirit <S%H7725>returneth<s%> unto <S%H430>God<s%> who gave <S%H5414>it<s%>.

And <S%H3148>further<s%>, because the <S%H6953>Preacher<s%> was <S%H2450>wise<s%>, he still <S%H3925>taught<s%> the <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H1847>knowledge<s%>; <S%H239>yea<s%>, he pondered, and sought <S%H2713>out<s%>, and set in <S%H8626>order<s%> <S%H7235>many<s%> <S%H4912>proverbs<s%>.

The <S%H6953>Preacher<s%> <S%H1245>sought<s%> to find <S%H4672>out<s%> <S%H2656>acceptable<s%> <S%H1697>words<s%>, and that which was <S%H3789>written<s%> <S%H3476>uprightly<s%>, even <S%H1697>words<s%> of <S%H571>truth<s%>.

The <S%H1697>words<s%> of the <S%H2450>wise<s%> are as <S%H1861>goads<s%>; and as <S%H4930>nails<s%> well <S%H5193>fastened<s%> are the words of the <S%H1167>masters<s%> of <S%H627>assemblies<s%>, which are <S%H5414>given<s%> from <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H7462>shepherd<s%>.

And <S%H3148>furthermore<s%>, my <S%H1121>son<s%>, be <S%H2094>admonished<s%>: <S%H1992>of<s%> <S%H6213>making<s%> <S%H7235>many<s%> <S%H5612>books<s%> there is no <S%H7093>end<s%>; and <S%H7235>much<s%> <S%H3854>study<s%> is a <S%H3024>weariness<s%> of the <S%H1320>flesh<s%>.

This is the <S%H5490>end<s%> of the <S%H1697>matter<s%>; all hath been <S%H8085>heard<s%>: <S%H3372>fear<s%> <S%H430>God<s%>, and <S%H8104>keep<s%> his <S%H4687>commandments<s%>; for this is the whole duty of <S%H120>man<s%>.

For <S%H430>God<s%> will <S%H935>bring<s%> every <S%H4639>work<s%> into <S%H4941>judgment<s%>, with every hidden <S%H5956>thing<s%>, whether it be <S%H2896>good<s%>, or whether it be <S%H7451>evil<s%>.
